item.title: FANTASIAN Neo Dimension launch trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/fantasian-neo-dimension-launch-trailer

Publisher Square Enix and developer Mistwalker have released the launch trailer for turn-based RPG FANTASIAN Neo Dimension.

Here is an overview of the game, via Square Enix:

The Father of Final Fantasy, Hironobu Sakaguchi, and renowned composer Nobuo Uematsu return to deliver an original RPG story.

Mechteria—a deathly mechanical infection that robs humans of their emotions and lives—is slowly engulfing the world.

The protagonist Leo awakens with only one memory left to him in a strange land abundant with machines.

The human world, threatened by mechteria… a machine world, filled with mysteries… and the unseen dimensions that lie beyond both.

Using the Warp Device that was left behind, Leo must now embark on an interdimensional journey to reclaim his lost memories and save the world from the mechteria infection.

FANTASIAN Neo Dimension is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 5.

Watch the trailer below.

Launch Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: NES – Nintendo Switch Online adds Tetris on December 12
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/nes-nintendo-switch-online-adds-tetris-on-december-12

  • Switch

The Soviet game sensation.

The Nintendo Entertainment System – Nintendo Switch Online app will add the 1989-released Tetris game published by Nintendo on December 12, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via the back of its box:

About

The Soviet game sensation!

Your pulse quickens. Beams, boxes, zig-zags, and “L” shaped building blocks drop relentlessly down a narrow passage.

You quickly spin, shift, and align the shapes then slide them in for a perfect fit.

It’s challenging and the pace is demanding. But satisfaction comes as you position each block neatly into place.

Start at new heights for a tougher contest. Pick the music and set your pace from 20 progressive skill levels.
